title: Initiation
description: Julia gets in over her head when she sneaks back into the secret society sex club for Derek's initiation. Will their budding relationship survive a night filled with sexual decadence? Readers Beware! Part 6 is dripping with kinky, sexy fun and is not for the faint of heart! The Billionaire's Son 6 : Initiation is a ~10,500 word erotic romance which contains explicit depictions of sexual acts and a sexy billionaire playboy behaving badly. This story is intended for an adult audience only!
author: Arabella Quinn
